src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Air prògram rèidio Sveriges san t-Suain Diluain, dh’fhoillsich Sara Danius, rùnaire maireannach Chomataidh Nobel airson Litreachais aig Acadamaidh na Suaine, gun do dh’fhairtlich air a’ chomataidh fios dìreach a chur gu Bob Dylan mu bhith buannachadh Duais Litreachais Nobel 2016 agus gun robh iad air an oidhirpean a leigeil seachad.
hyp_text: Air a’ Mhàirt, Sara Danius, secataire a’ Chomataidh Nobel air Litreachas aig an Acadamaidh Sualannach, thug aithneachadh air an luchd-cluiche air an stèisean raidio air Sveriges Radio ann an Sualainn gur dìomhair a bhiodh an comataidh, gun robh Bob Dylan a’ fàgail a’ bhith a’ gabhail a-steach air an Òrd an Litreachais ann an 2016, a chur a chèile.

src_text: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

hyp_text: Tha Danius a’ ràdh, "Tha mi a’ dèanamh airson an latha an-diugh. Chaidh mi a chur air phost agus a chur e-maile gu collogairde a tha na bheag air a’ chùis agus tha iad a’ freagairt gu math dearbh. An-dràsta, tha sin gu math gu leòr."

src_text: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref_text: Mar Chomhairleach Tèarainteachd Nàiseanta, chuidich e Carter le cùisean na cruinne a làimhseachadh le liut dioplòmasach a leithid Còrdaidhean Champa Dhàibhidh, 1978; àbhaisteachadh dàimhean nan SA–Sìona aig deireadh nan 1970an; aramach Ioràin a dh’adhbhraich càs bhràighdean-gill Ioràin, 1979; agus brùthadh nan Sovietach a-steach do dh’Afganastan, 1979.
hyp_text: Mar NSA, chuidich e ris an t-seann chaidsear, Carter, a chur ri cinn an t-saoghail a bhrosnachadh, mar a bha an Camp David Accords, 1978; an còrdadh a thug a-mach a’ Ghnàth-Stàit agus na h-Sìona, a bha a’ dol air adhart anns na 1970an; an Rèabhlaid na h-Iorana, a chaidh a dhèanamh ann an 1979; agus an sgrios a thug a-mach na Ruisean ann an Afganastan, 1979.

src_text: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
ref_text: Leis nach eil luirg leasaichte aig na h-itean dìneasair, ris an canar rachis, ach leis gu bheil feartan eile de dh’itean aca – dealgan agus dubhain – bha an luchd-rannsachaidh den bheachd gun robh e coltach gun robh an rachis na thoradh air mean-fhàs nas fhaide air adhart na na feartan eile sin.
hyp_text: O chionn ’s gun robh na sionnach-dhòmhnallaich a’ ghathach air a bhith a’ dol air adhart, tha a’ rachis, ach tha iad air a bhith a’ gabhail ri a h-uile chùis eile de ghathach — barbs agus barbules — tha na rannsaichean air a bhith a’ toirt leis a bha seo na rachis a bhith a’ tachairt a’ dol air adhart mar rud eile.

src_text: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
ref_text: Tha structar na h-ite a’ cur nar sùilean nach deach an cleachdadh airson itealaich ach airson stiùireadh na teothachd no taisbeanadh. Chuir an luchd-rannsachaidh nar sùilean gu bheil, fiù mas e earball dìneasair òig a tha seo, am ball-sampaill a’ sealltainn itean inbhich agus chan e clòimh isein.
hyp_text: Tha an stòras a’ shnàmhaid a’ toirt seachad gun robh iad air a bhith air a chleachdadh ann an flìth, ach airson rèisinn no airson seallaidh. Dh’innis na rannsachadh gun robh seo a’ ghaoth, ged a bha e seo a’ ghaoth dhen òg-dheorsa, tha e a’ sealltainn gaoth-adhair agus chan e gaoth-chreagach.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
ref_text: Cha do dh’fhàg Duvall, a tha pòsta is aig a bheil dithis chloinne inbheach, drùdhadh mòr air Miller, ris an do dh’innis e an sgeulachd.
hyp_text: Chuir Duvall, a bha a’ fuireach còmhla ri duine eile, dhà clann farsaing, na h-ìmpidh air Miller, a bha an sgeul seo a’ dol a chur ris.

src_text: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
ref_text: Nuair a dh’iarradh air a bheachd, thuirt Miller, “Bidh Mike a’ bruidhinn gu tric tron chùis…Bha mi gam ullachadh, mar sin cha robh mi dha-rìribh ag èisteachd ris na bha e ag ràdh.”
hyp_text: Nuair a chuir an ceist air, thuirt Miller, "Tha Mike a' bruidhinn gu mòr anns an searbh," "Bha mi a' dol gu rùn mar sin chan eil mi a' faighinn a-mach cò a bh' anns an fhacal a bha e a' bruidhinn."

src_text: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
ref_text: Ach, tha coltas ìosal air a’ cheudad de XDR-TB anns a’ bhuidheann dhaoine gu lèir a tha tinn leis a’ chaitheamh; 6,000 den t-suim iomlan; 330,000 duine air am bragadh aig àm àraidh sam bith ann an Afraga a Deas.
hyp_text: Ged nach eil e math a bhith a’ tuigsinn, tha cothrom de TB-XDR san grunn de dhaoine a tha air a bhith a’ fuireach TB fada air a bhith ann; 6,000 de na 330,000 daoine a bhios air a bhith air a bhith a’ fuireach anns an t-samhradh san Afraga a Tuath.

src_text: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
ref_text: A rèir na cùis-lagha, cha deach sgudal bho champa nan Dùthchannan Aonaichte a slàinteachadh gu ceart, agus mar thoradh air seo, chaidh bacteria a-steach do dh’fho-abhainn aig an Abhainn Artibonite, tè den fheadhainn as motha ann an Haiti.
hyp_text: Leis a’ bhuaidh, bha a’ bhàs air an gnothachd, bha mì-chleachdadh aig na campaichean a’ chùis, agus bha ìomhaighean a’ tighinn a-steach gu tributar an t-srutha Artibonite, an t-srutha as motha ann an Haiti.

src_text: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
ref_text: Thachair tubaist adhair air a’ mhìos seo chaidh, cho dona is a bh’ ann an Iran o cionn bhliadhnaichean nuair a thàinig itealan a bha a’ dol a dh’ Armenia a-nuas, a’ marbhadh nan 168 neach a bha air bòrd.
hyp_text: An t-Iuchar, bha an t-Iran air a bhith a’ faicinn an rathad-as-èirigh as lugha sa bhliadhna nuair a dhùisg aerlois a bha a’ dol chun na h-Armania, agus a’ mharbhadh na 168 a bha air bòrd.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.

[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.

[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.

hyp_text: Chaidh bàs-bacan a thoirt a-steach aig oifis an t-seann chòmhairlear.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref_text: Dh’aithris rannsachairean à Oilthigh Princeton ann an Ameireagaidh agus Oilthigh Uppsala san t-Suain gun robh mean-fhàs anns a’ ghnè ùr dìreach an dèidh dà ghinealaich, ged a bhathar am beachd gun tug am pròiseas seo cus na b’ fhaide, ri linn briodachaidh eadar an glaisean Darwin is Geospiza fortes dùthchasach, agus an gaisean cactais, Geospiza conirostris, a tha na eun in-imrich.
hyp_text: Rinn luchd-tadhail bho Oilthigh Princeton anns na Stàitean Aonaichte agus Oilthigh Uppsala anns an t-Suain aithisg an t-sinnsireachd ùr a thàinig ann ann an dà ginealach, ged a bha e air a chur an cèill gum bi seo a’ tachairt air feadh iomadh uair nas lùghdha, mar a thàinig còmhla an Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, a bha a’ fuireach anns an àite agus Geospiza conirostris, an cactus finch a thàinig a-mach à àite eile.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical.
ref_text: S e uiread nan idheonaichean hàidhdreaidein (an H ann am pH) san stuth cheimigeach a tha fo dheuchainn a tha a’ comharradh ìre a’ pH.
hyp_text: Tha a leibhéal phH a’ taisbeanaidheachd leis an àireamh nan ion-ion Hidrigin (H ann an phH) ann an a’ cheimigean a tha a’ dol a-mach.

src_text: Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
ref_text: Is e idheonaichean hàidhdreaidein pròtonan bhon deach na h-eleactronan aca a shracadh dhiubh (leis gu bheil aon phròton is aon eleactron ann an atam hàidhdreaidein).
hyp_text: Ionadh Hidròig tha pròtanaichean a tha a’ gabhail a-steach a bharrachd eilectròn (mar a tha hidròid-àtmhainnean a’ gabhail a-steach aon pròtan agus aon eilectròn).

[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

src_text: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
ref_text: S toil le osalotaichean beathaichean beaga ithe. Glacaidh iad muncaidhean, nathraichean, creimich agus eòin ma gheibh iad grèim orra. Tha cha mhòr gach beathach a shealgas an t-osalot fada nas lugha na e fhèin.
hyp_text: Tha ocelots a’ pògadh beathaichean beaga. Faodaidh iad a’ chlàradh monaichean, uibheasan, rèinichean agus feòragan, mur eil iad a’ feuchainn ri iad. Tha gach beathaichean a tha iad a’ toirt a-mach a’ tighinn gu mòr nas beaga na tha iad fhèin.

src_text: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
ref_text: Nuair a bhios buidheann bheag de rudan beò (sluagh beag) air an sgaradh bhon phrìomh shluagh às an tàinig iad (mar eisimpleir, ma nì iad imrich thairis air sreath bheanntan no abhainn, no ma ghluaiseas iad gu eilean ùr gus nach urrainn dhaibh gluasad air ais gu furasta) bidh iad gu tric ann an àrainneachd eadar-dhealaichte ris na bh’ aca roimhe.
hyp_text: Nuair a bhios grunnach beag de bheathaichean beathaich (a bheil a’ phoballachd beag) a’ fàgail an phoballachd a bha iad a’ tighinn à (mar a bha iad a’ dol air a’ chnoc a tha anns an àite a tha iad a’ fuireach, no a bha iad a’ dol air an abhainn, no a bha iad a’ dol air eilean ùr far nach eil iad air an àite a tha iad a’ fuireach air a’ ghnàth) bidh iad a’ smaoineachadh air a’ chuid as motha den àite a tha iad a’ fuireach anns an latha an-diugh.

src_text: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
ref_text: Is e gnè-fhàs a chanas sin ris a’ phròiseas seo, tha seo dìreach a’ ciallachadh fàs gnèithean ùra. Tha gnè-fhàs na bhuil do-sheachainte agus na phàirt glè chudromach de mhean-fhàs.
hyp_text: Tha sinn a’ cleachdadh an t-ainm speciation airson an process seo, agus tha e a’ ciallachadh gu bheil e na bhàsadh nàdarra. Tha speciation na chùis a bha ri chur an dèidh agus tha e na pàirt cudthromach den evoluineachd.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

src_text: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
ref_text: Mar eisimpleir, cha robh coirce-Innseanach aca no tomàtothan no buntàta no còco agus cha do bhlais seann Ròmanach cearc-Fhrangach a-riamh.

src_text: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.

src_text: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.

src_text: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.
ref_text: Stèidhich Companaidh Innseachan an Ear nan Duitseach bunait ann an iar-dheas Thaidh-Bhàn ann an 1624, a’ cur gu dol atharrachadh mòr sna dòighean air an robh na tùsanaich a’ toirt fàs air gràinean agus a’ fastadh luchd-obrach Sìneach air na planntachasan rìs is siùcair aca.
hyp_text: Ann an 1624, chuir Companaidh na h-India an Iar na Holland a-steach stèisean ann an Taibhse an Iar, a’ toirt a-steach ath-chruthachadh ann an pràisean fàs na gràinean aig an àiteachas dhuibhseach agus ag obair air an stèisean airson na h-India an Iar.

src_text: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.
ref_text: Ann an 1683, ghabh feachdan rìoghrachas Qing (1644-1912) smachd air sgìrean oirthir an iar agus a tuath Thaiwan agus ghairm iad gun robh Taiwan na sgìre de dh’Ìmpireachd Qing ann an 1885.
hyp_text: Ann an 1683, chaidh aontas Qing (1644-1912) a chur an cèill air a’ Ghàidhealtachd agus air na h-àiteachan a’ tuath air Taiwan agus chaidh Taiwan a chur air an liosta mar phrìomhachd de na h-Empireachd Qing ann an 1885.

src_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
ref_text: Tha riaghaltas nan Qing a’ cur ainm ri Cùmhnant Shimonoseki ann an 1895 an dèidh dhaibh a’ chiad chogadh eadar an t-Sìn is an t-Seapan a chall (1894-1895) agus ghèill seo flaitheas thar Taidh-Bhàn dhan t-Seapan a riaghlaich an t-eilean gu 1945.
hyp_text: Ann an 1895, an dèidh a bhith a’ fàgail ann an Cogadh Sìona-Japanach a’ Chéide (1894-1895), tha rìoghachd Qing a’ siubhal an t-seann chòir na h-iarbhiseachd a thaobh Taiwan a chumail leis an t-Seapan, a bhios a’ riaghladh an eilean gu ruige 1945.

src_text: Most of the buildings on the edges of the complex have been rebuilt in order to give tourists a better idea of how they originally appeared.
ref_text: Chaidh a’ mhòrchuid dhe na togalaichean aig oir na làraich ath-thogail airson ’s gum faic luchd-turais an coltas a bhiodh orra o thùs nas fheàrr.
hyp_text: Tha a’ mhòr-chuid de na taighean air a’ bhonnachan den choimphris air a thogail às ùr airson an turasach airson fiosrachadh nas fheàrr a thoirt dha an dè tha iad a’ tòiseachadh mar.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2.
ref_text: Ri linn sin, canar gur e 3:2 an co-mheas deilbh aig an fhòrmat seo (ga roinneadh le dà dheug airson an co-mheas as sìmplidhe fhaighinn a tha na àireamh shlàn).

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.

src_text: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
ref_text: Tha cinnteachas teicneolasach na bhriathar a tha an da-rìribh a’ gabhail a-staigh iomadh rud, eadar putadh teicneolais no an riatanas teicneolasach agus seagh teann a tha ag ràdh gu bheil dàn mac an duine ga bhrosnachadh le loidsig foidhe a tha co-cheangailte ri laghan saidheansail agus am foillseachas san teicneolas.
hyp_text: Tha “deimntineachd teicneòlasach” an t-ainm a th’ aig roinn mhòr de dh’fhiosrachadh ann an pràise, o bhuaidh bheachdachd “a’ chur air adhart” no “cùlachd teicneòlasach” gu rianmhor a tha a’ gabhail ri dòigh dhéidheilteach gu bheil an dàimh-dhachaigh na duine a’ dol tro ìmheachd-lagha a tha a’ buntainn ri riaghailtean nàdarra agus a’ taisbeanadh ann an teicneòlas.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: Tha dà bheachd-smuaint an cumantas aig a’ mhòrchuid de mhìneachaidhean air cinnteachas teicneolais: gu bheil leasachadh an teicneolais e fhèin a’ leantainn slighe a tha gu ìre mhòr taobh a-muigh buaidh cultair no poileataigs agus gu bheil, mu seach, “buaidhean” aig an teicneolas air sòisealtasan a tha fighte a-staigh, seach fo bhuaidh an t-sòisealtais.
hyp_text: Tha còmhlan de phrìomh-àrdadh de dh’fhaireachdainn nan sgoilearan nan tèaraintean a’ gabhail dà prìomh-àrdadh: ged a bheir seo ri fhaireachdainn nach eil fàs nan tèaraintean fhèin air a’ rathad a bheil mòran nas fhaide air falbh na bheil buaidh cultarail no poilitigeach, agus ged a bheir seo ri fhaireachdainn nach eil buaidh nan tèaraintean air a’ chultar a tha ann an dòigh dhen chòir, a thaobh nan earrannan a tha a’ tighinn a-mach.

src_text: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
ref_text: A thaobh romansachais, thug an tìr buaidh air muinntir an àite, agus dh’èirich gnàthsan is dualchas a bhuineadh don tìr ri tìm. Agus, bha iad seo nas fheàrr na laghan a sparradh gu h-aon-deònach seach gun robh iad a’ còrdadh ris an àite anns an robh an sluagh.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.

[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

hyp_text: Tha e cuideachd a’ dèanamh a’ phàirt eile de dh’fhaireachdainn biorachdach a bhith a’ bruidhinn mu mhìltean de dh’uisge (gu h-àraidh uisge no tè, diuretic ainmeil), a’ cur air an t-siubhal gu tighinn a-mach airson a bhith a’ deanamh a-mach.

hyp_text: Is e an t-Saothair Deaith na h-àite choisireach de bhith a’ smaointeanachadh ann an tìr na Tibet. [English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.

[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.

[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.

[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.

src_text: However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref_text: Ge-tà, cha robh e fiù oidhche mus robh na planaichean seo gun fheum nuair a thàinig barrachd air 800,000 saighdear o Arm Dearg an Aonaidh Sovietaich a-steach a chruthachadh fronta Bealaruis agus fronta na h-Ucràine an dèidh dhaibh briseadh a-steach air ceàrnaidhean ann an taobh an ear na Pòlainne, a’ briseadh Cùmhnant Sìth Rìga, An Còrdadh Neo-ionnsaigheachd Sovietach is Pòlainneach agus cùmhnantan eadar-nàiseanta eile, an dà chuid feadhainn dhà-thaobhach is ioma-thaobhach.
hyp_text: Ach chaidh na planaichean seo a thogail air ais anns a’ cheud oidhche, nuair a thàinig dà cheud ochd mìle saighdearan à an t-Arm Choireachd Shòirseil na Ruis a-steach agus a chruthaich na h-àiteachan Belaruis agus Ucràinis ann an dàimh na h-àiteachan an iar na Phòlainn ann an leisgeul airson na Riga Peace Treaty, an Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, agus còmhla ri na h-ionnsachaidhean eadar-nàiseanta, leis a h-uile duine.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

src_text: Although wagonways merely consisted of parallel planks of wood, they allowed horses pulling them to achieve greater speeds and pull larger loads than on the slightly more rough roads of the day.
ref_text: Ged nach robh ann an rèile fheunan ach dèilean fiodha ri taobh a chèile, thug iad comas do dh’eich a bha gan tarraing falbh aig astar nas luaithe agus luchdan nas motha a tharraing na b’ urrainn dhaibh air rathad na linn ud a bha beagan nas gairbhe.
hyp_text: Ged nach robh wagonways a-mhàin ann an cruth de làrach lèir, chaidh iad a chleachdadh le cabarach a’ gabhail a-steach a-mhàin, agus leis an robh iad a’ toirt seachad a bharrachd de spiodaichean agus a’ gabhail a-steach a-mhàin a dh’fheumalachd nas fhaide na bha na sràidean eadar-dhealaichte nas fhaide a’ tachairt san latha.

[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

[English]: Crossties were introduced fairly early to hold the tracks in place. Gradually, however, it was realised that tracks would be more efficient if they had a stip of iron on the top.

src_text: This became common practice, but the iron caused more wear on the wooden wheels of the wagons.
ref_text: Thàinig seo gu bhith na ghnàth-chleachdadh, ach bhiodh an t-iarann a’ caitheamh barrachd de dh’fhiodh cuibhlichean nam feun-charbadan.
hyp_text: Tha e air a bhith air a chleachdadh gu tric, ach tha an iarann a’ ciallachadh mòran fàs air an guthan fiodha a bh’ anns na guthaichean.

src_text: Eventually, wooden wheels were replaced by iron wheels. In 1767, the first full-iron rails were introduced.
ref_text: Ghabh cuibhlichean iarainn àite nan cuibhlichean fiodha aig a’ cheann thall. Nochd rèilean làn-iarainn ann an 1767 an toiseach.
hyp_text: Air an dàrna latha, bha dòighean leasachaidh a’ fàgail na clachan agus na stèiseanan. Anns an 19mh linn, chaidh an còmhstri a dhèanamh eadar na seirbheisean rioghaltais agus na seirbheisean pàrlamaideach. Tha e a’ ciallachadh gun robh na seirbheisean rioghaltais air an dèanamh a-mach às a’ phàrlamaid.

src_text: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man).
ref_text: S e coiseachd a’ chiad ghiùlan a dh’èirich cho fad ’s fhios dhuinn, thòisich an cinne-daonna air coiseachd air an dà chas dà mhillean bliadhna air ais nuair a nochd homo erectus (a’ ciallachadh duine ceann-dìreach).
hyp_text: Tha an t-aon taobh-chuairt aithneichte air an robh a’ dol a’ dol a thaobh chun a’ chuairt, thòisich daoine a’ dol a’ dol air an aon làrach dhà mìle bliadhnaichean air ais le tòiseachadh Homo Erectus (a’ ciallachadh fear a’ dol a’ dol).

src_text: Bipedal specializations are found in Australopithecus fossils from 4.2-3.9 million years ago, although Sahelanthropus may have walked on two legs as early as seven million years ago.
ref_text: Gheibhear àraidheachadh dà-chasach ann am fosailean australopithecus o 4.2 gu 3.9 millean bliadhna air ais ach dh’fhaoidte gun robh sahelanthropus a’ coiseachd air a dhà chas cho tràth ri seachd millean bliadhna air ais.
hyp_text: Tha speisealan bipedalach air fhaicinn ann an fosilean Australopithecus bho 4.2-3.9 millean bliadhna a chaidh seachad, ged a tha Sahelanthropus air a bhith a’ dol air dhà shionnach aig àm as sine, seachd millean bliadhna a chaidh seachad.

src_text: This term derives from ancient familiarity with Bed-bugs, which are insects highly adapted to parasitize humans.

src_text: Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals.
ref_text: Tha aithris air ruitheaman ùineach, nach eil dìreach nam freagairtean do shanasan ùine on taobh a-muigh, anns a’ mhòrchuid de rudan beòtha, a’ gabhail a-staigh lobhagan, fungasan, lusan is beathaichean.
hyp_text: A’ chur air bhog a’ chòrr de na beathaichean, is anns a’ chòrr de na speiceatan, tha rithmean-taobh, nach eil a-mhàin freagairtean ri rithmean-taobh a-muigh, air a chur air adhart.

src_text: Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.
ref_text: S e luaisgeanairean fèin-bheathachaidh a tha sna cleocan bhith-eòlach a chumas an cuairt orra gu saor greis eadhon nuair a bhios taic bho oidheaman on taobh a-muigh a dhìth.

src_text: Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium.

hyp_text: Chleachd Hershey is Chase virusan, no phages, a chur anns a’ chèill a bhruidhinn a’ fàgail a’ chuid fhèin aca de DNA a chur ann an bactear.

src_text: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently.
ref_text: Is e meanbh-fhrìdean a’ chiad ainmhidhean a thug na speuran orra. Bha an comas aca air iteig na chuideachadh dhaibh le bhith a’ seachnadh chreachadairean nas soirbhe agus a’ lorg biadh is companaich ann an dòigh nas cliobhaire.
hyp_text: Bha iomairt nam beathaichean a’ chiad choimhearsnachd a bha a’ cleachdadh na gaoithe. Leis a’ bhith a’ seachadadh aig ìre nas fhaisge agus a’ lorg bia agus pòcaidean nas fheàrr, bha iad a’ toirt a-steach cuideam a bhiodh a’ cuideachadh leis an aon rud.

src_text: Generally speaking, two behaviors can emerge as managers begin to lead their former peers. One end of the spectrum is trying to remain “one of the guys” (or gals).
ref_text: Anns a’ chumantas, faodaidh dà dhòigh-ghiùlain èirigh nuair a thòisicheas manaidsearan air an seann cho-inbhich a stiùireadh. Is e aon dòigh a bhith a’ feuchainn ri cumail orra “mar fhear (no mar tè) san t-sreath”.
hyp_text: Leis a’ chuid as cumhachdaiche, dh’fhaodadh dà chomportachd a th’ann an dà chuid dhen speactrum nuair a tha manger a’ toirt a dhol ri a bheil an ceann-latha aca. Tha an t-àite ceartach a’ dol gu bhith “an duine sam bith” (no duine sam bith eile).
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: They often have more autonomy than conventional team members as their teams may meet according to varying time zones which may not be understood by their local management.
ref_text: Gu tric tha barrachd fèin-ùghdarras aca na buill àbhaisteach an sgioba oir dh’fhaoidte gun coinnich na sgiobannan aca ri chèile a rèir nan diofar roinnean-tìde nach tuig an luchd-stiùiridh ionadail aca ’s dòcha.
hyp_text: Faodaidh iad a bhith ag obair na bu as àirde na buidhnean-coiseachd tron àbhaisteach a bhith a’ gabhail pàirt anns na buidhnean sin, oir is urrainn do na buidhnean sin a bhith a’ tighinn còmhla ann an àm-ghnàthachd a tha a’ leantainn na sgìrean-tìme a tha air an dèanamh aig a’ chompanaidh agus tha sin dìreach na buaidh a tha a’ fàgail aig a’ chompanaidh a tha a’ ruith a’ chompanaidh.

src_text: The presence of a true “invisible team” (Larson and LaFasto, 1989, p109) is also a unique component of a virtual team.
ref_text: Ma tha “sgioba neo-fhaicsinneach” dha-rìribh an làthair (Larson agus LaFasto, 1989, td109), ’s e co-phàirt àraidh a tha sin de sgioba bhiortail.

[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: It has been known for a long time that different types of brain damage, traumas, lesions, and tumours affect behaviour and cause changes in some mental functions.
ref_text: Tha e aithnichte o chionn fhada a-nis gu bheil diofar sheòrsaichean de dhochann, ciùrradh, lotan is tùmoran air an eanchainn a’ toirt buaidh air modh-giùlain agus atharraichean air cuid de ghnìomhan na h-inntinne.
hyp_text: Tha e air a bhith aithne gu tric gu bheil dòighean de dh’fhuairnean-bruaich, traumata, fainichidhean, agus tuim air a bhith a’ brosnachadh comhairleachd agus a’ cur air dòigh atharrachaidhean ann an cuid de chomhairlichean-bruaich.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: Examples include control, planning and scheduling, the ability to answer customer diagnoses and questions, as well as handwriting recognition, voice and face.
ref_text: Am measg nan eisimpleirean, gheibhear stiùireadh, planadh is sgeidealachadh, an comas freagairt ri diagnosaichean is ceistean an luchd-cleachdaidh, a thuilleadh air aithneachadh làmh-sgrìobhaidh, guth is aodann.
hyp_text: Tha e a’ ciallachadh a bharrachd airson rianachadh, planadh agus sgrìobhadh, an comas a bhith a’ freagairt le freagairtean agus ceistean do chustaimich, a bharrachd air a bhith a’ gabhail ris an t-sgrìobhadh luchd-sgrìobhaidh, a’ guth agus a’ chòmhradh.

src_text: Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems.
ref_text: Tha an leithid de rudan air a dhol nam meuran-rannsachaidh fa leth, a’ leigeil cuideam air fuasglaidhean a thoirt do dh’fhìor dhuilgheadasan na beatha.

src_text: The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.
ref_text: Thèid an siostam IF a chleachdadh gu tric ann an eaconamachd, leigheas, einnseanaireachd agus san arm gu tric a-nis agus chaidh a chur am broinn grunn aplacaidean bathair-bhog airson coimpiutairean dachaigh agus geamannan video.
hyp_text: Tha an t-ainmneach seo a-nis a’ cleachdadh gu tric anns na lìonaidhean eaconamach, leigheas, innealtachd is an t-arm, mar a bha e a’ togail ann an iomadh prògram-chlàr cuideigin agus video gèam.

src_text: Field trips are a large part of any classroom. Quite often a teacher would love to take her students places to which a bus trip is not an option.
ref_text: Tha tursan-ionnsachaidh nam pàirt mhòr de sheòmar-teagaisg sam bith. Tachraidh e gu tric gum bu toil do thidsear na h-oileanaich aca a thoirt a dh’àite nach ruigear le bus.
hyp_text: Tha turas-chluich a tha ri fhaotainn aig a h-uile sgoil. Mar a bhios e a bharrachd air a bhith gu math tric gur fheum e leis an neach-òraidh a bhith a’ toirt a’ chiad chlann dhan àite far a bheil bus turasachaidh chan eil ann.

src_text: Technology offers the solution with virtual field trips. Students can look at museum artifacts, visit an aquarium, or admire beautiful art while sitting with their class.
ref_text: Tha teicneòlas a’ tabhann an fhuasglaidh le tursan blàir mas-fhìor. Is urrainn do dh’oileanaich coimhead air ulaidhean taigh-tasgaidh, tadhal air uisgeadan no tlachd a ghabhail à ealan maiseach fhad ’s a bhios iad nan suidhe còmhla ris a’ chlas.
hyp_text: Tha an teicneòlas a’ freagairt ris an aon a bhios ann an turas air an àite seo. Faodaidh luchd-ileachdachd a thoirt a-steach mìltean de dh’fhearann, faodaidh iad tilleadh a-steach air an àrainneachd, no faodaidh iad a bhith a’ faireachdainn air a’ chèile a-mhàin leis a’ chlas.

src_text: Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that.
ref_text: Tha blogaichean cuideachd nan cuideachadh airson piseach a thoirt air sgrìobhadh nan oileanach. Ged a tha an gràmar is litreachadh gu tric robach an toiseach, fàsaidh iad nas fheàrr air sa chumantas nuair a gheibh iad luchd-leughaidh.
hyp_text: Faodaidh blogaidean cuideachadh cuideachd leis an sgrìobhadh a’ mhac-leannan. Ged a bhios luchd-tadhail a’ tòiseachadh a’ chùisean blogaidh aca le gramadach lùbaidh agus cleachdadh fuaimean, tha an t-eadar-theanga a’ brosnachadh a’ mharbhadh sin.

src_text: Also blogging "forces students to become more savvy about the world around them." The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004).

hyp_text: Tha an luchd-sgrùdaidh cuideachd a’ moladh gur e fòrsa a tha a’ dèanamh a’ bhlog a’ toirt sgoilearan gu bhith nas fhasaiche air a’ chathair timcheall air an t-saoghal. src_text: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
ref_text: Chaidh am baile ris an canar Casablanca an-diugh a stèidheachadh le iasgairean Berber san 10mh linn RC. Chuirte gu feum e le Phoenesianich, Ròmanaich, agus sluagh Mherenid mar bhaile-puirt cudromach ris a chante Anfa.
hyp_text: Chaidh am baile mòdern Casablanca a stèidheachadh le luchd-fionnlagha Berber anns an 10mh linn ro Chrìs, agus bha e air a chleachdadh leis na Foiniceach, na Ròmanaich, agus na Merenaid na phort-stràic a chaidh a chleachdadh ris Anfa.

src_text: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.

src_text: The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain.
ref_text: Chan e dìreach boglaichean mangrove a th’ anns na coilltean ge-tà – tha cuid de na pìosan mu dheireadh annta de na diungailean mòra a bha uair air feadh an raoin Ghanges.
hyp_text: Chan eil na coilltean air a bhith gu math na sgeamaichean na mangroiveachd a tha sin — tha iad a’ ciallachadh cuid de na stàitean a tha air fàgail an dèidh dhaibh a bhith air a chumail na dòigh-jungal a bha a’ cur a-steach na planaighean na Gange.

src_text: Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref_text: Bho 1966 tha na Sundarbans air a bhith nan comraich fiadh-bheatha, agus thathar a’ meas gu bheil 400 tìgear Rìoghail Beangal agus timcheall air 30,000 fèidh bhreac anns an sgìre a-nis.

src_text: As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance.

hyp_text: Mar a tha busan eadar-district air a bhith uaireannan fliuch, tha e fìor-cheart dhaibh a’ tighinn a-mach a’ phàigheadh bileag a chòig là roimhe sin.
prompt:

src_text: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
ref_text: S e drochaid le staoighean càbaill a th’ ann an Drochaid Abhainn Oyapock. Tha e a’ dol thairis air Abhainn Oyapock is a’ ceangal baile Oiapoque ann am Braisil agus Saint-Georges de l’Oyapock ann an Guidheàna na Frainge ri chèile.
hyp_text: Drochaid Uisge an Oiapoc is bròg a tha a’ stèidheachadh air maoilean. Tha e a’ gabhail a-steach an Oiapoc airson an dàil eadar an Oiapoque ann an Bhrasil agus Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock ann an Frangach-Ghuiana.

src_text: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.

src_text: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.

src_text: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.
ref_text: Chan eil crogallan-sàile a’ fuireach sa chuan an da-rìribh, ’s e na h-inbhirean aibhne a tuath air Rockhampton a’ prìomh àrainneachd aca.
hyp_text: Na Crogaidhean-Saltaidh chan eil iad a’ fuireach beò gu h-ìreach ann an an t-àbhainn, a’ mhòr-chuid de na h-àiteachan aca tha anns na h-àiseagan a’ chrochaidh a tha anns an ear-dheas bho Rockhampton.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.
ref_text: Ma ghlèidheas tu àite ro làimh, bidh inntinn an neach-siubhail aig fois is fios aca gum bi àite aca far an dèan iad cadal nuair a ruigeas iad an ceann-uidhe.
hyp_text: Leis a’ chur a-steach an t-ainm, tha e a’ toirt ann an àm a tha a’ luchd-turais a-mach a bhith a’ smaoineachadh gu bheil iad a’ gabhail a-steach seòladh air a bheil iad a’ tighinn gu dachaigh.

src_text: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.
ref_text: Bidh buidhnean-siubhail gu tric a’ tabhann bharganan le taighean-òsta sònraichte, ach dh’fhaodadh e bhith comasach dhut àitean-fuirich eile a chur air dòigh le buidheann-siubhail, leithid àrainnean campachaidh.
hyp_text: Tha seann-àrdachan trèanaidh a’ coimhead air dòigh gur eil iad a’ faighinn dealbhan le h-òrdugh-àiteachan airson seann-àiteachan airson clàraidhean, ged a tha e cuideachd math a bhith a’ lorg àiteachan eile de dh’fhàgail, mar cùl-bheatha, aig seann-àrdachan trèanaidh.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
ref_text: S e am pìos eadar Point Marion agus Fairmont am fear as dùbhlanaiche a thaobh dràibhidh air a’ mhòr-rathad eadar Buffalo is Pittsburgh, a’ dol tro cheàrnaidhean aonaranach coillteach gu tric.
hyp_text: Tha na cùisean a bhios ag iarraidh air an t-siubhail eadar Point Marion is Fairmont na tòrr a tha air a dhol a-mach air an t-siubhail Buffalo-Pittsburgh, a’ pasg air a bharrachd tron tìr mhòr às a’ chùl.

src_text: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
ref_text: Chan eil pastraidhean Gearmailteach dona agus ann am Bavaria, tha iad gu math mèath ’s tha caochladh ann dhiubh, coltach ris an fheadhainn aig an nàbaidh mu dheas aca, an Ostair.
hyp_text: Tha briosgaidean Gearmailteach gu math math, agus ann an Bheurla, tha iad gu math rìreabh agus dearrsach, mar a tha na briosgaidean a tha a’ gabhail a-steach ann an Ostair, a tha ri taobh a deas.

src_text: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.

src_text: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.

src_text: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
ref_text: Turas poca-droma sgìthidh: Canar sgìtheadh backcountry, cuairtean sgìthidh no turas-cuairte sgìthidh ris a’ ghnìomhachd seo cuideachd.
hyp_text: Dùnachadh a’ bhaile le spòrs: Tha seo a’ ciallachadh a’ chleachdadh an t-siùcair cuideachd, spòrs a’ gheamhraidh, siùcair a’ gheamhraidh no siùcair a’ dhubhachadh.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.

src_text: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
ref_text: Ge-tà, fiù sa bheatha thradaiseanta aca, cha robh gach Sámi an sàs tuathanachas mòr nan rèin-fhiadh ach ris an iasgach, sealg no rudan mar sin is cha bhiodh rèin-fhèidh aca ach mar bheathaichean-obrach.

src_text: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
ref_text: Ged a chluinnear e gu tric, gu sònraichte am measg daoine neo-Romanaitheach, thathar dhen bheachd san fharsaingeachd gur e facal oilbheumach a th’ ann an “Siopsach” a chionn ’s gu bheil e co-cheangailte ri droch ghnàth-ìomhaighean agus dealbh ceàrr dhen mhuinntir Romanaitheach.

src_text: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
ref_text: S e dian-aimsir am briathar coitcheann airson aimsir chunnartach sam bith a dh’fhaodadh damaiste, briseadh a-steach air an t-sòisealtas no call beatha adhbharachadh.
hyp_text: Tha fàsachadh mhòr na chiall-mhìneachadh air aon de na h-atharrachaidhean a thaobh na h-èirinnidh a tha anns a’ chùis, a bheir buaidh mhòr air an t-saoghal, a thaobh an t-saoghail, no a thaobh an duine.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.

hyp_text: Tàilleadh, airgid, mìorbha, agus tachartasan nam fuinneachd mhòra, mar a tha a’ gheamhradh, a’ gheamhradh, a’ chruach, agus a’ gheamhradh, a tha anns na foirmichean agus na h-eifeachdan de na fuinneachd mhòra, mar a tha a’ gheamhradh, a’ gheamhradh, a’ chruach, agus a’ gheamhradh.

src_text: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.

src_text: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
ref_text: An 1994, dh’adhbhraich an cogadh seo gun deach Poblachd Transnistria fhèin-ainmeachadh ’s a chruthachadh ann an taobh an ear Mholdòbha. Tha a riaghaltas is ruith-airgid aice fhèin ach chan eil i air a h-aithneachadh le ball sam bith de na Dùthchannan Aonaichte.
hyp_text: Ann an 1994, bha seo a’ ciallachadh gu bheil an roinn Transnistria a’ clàradh a chur air bhog anns an t-Siar Moidove, a tha a’ gabhail a-steach seann rìoghachd, a tha a’ gabhail a-steach a h-uile riaghaltas agus airgeadachd ach chan eil e a’ cleachdadh le aon dùthaich anns an t-sìde.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach.

src_text: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
ref_text: Cuideachd, dèan cinnteach gum fuaimnich thu r agus rr air dòigh eadar-dhealaichte: tha caro a’ ciallachadh daor ach tha carro a’ ciallachadh carbad.
hyp_text: Air an dàrna dhòigh, cuir cinnteach gu bheil thu a’ bruidhinn air r agus rr gu leòr: caro a’ ciallachadh gu dear, ach carro a’ ciallachadh gu carota.
